name: The Early Days
description:
Help your tribe of Prehistory to settle down and evolve in a hostile world. Cross the story with your tribe and make it survive the many challenges that will get in your way.

De Conti Axel - Programmer

Dufour Killian - Artist (Cards Artworks) & VFX

Bertrand Nicolas - Game Designer / UI Designer

Bonanomi Paul - Game Designer

Tones Productions - Composer / Sound Designer

Language : English

Platformer : PC

Engine : Unity 3D
